description: Access real-time public transport across Europe with live departures, connections, and vehicle details. Plan door-to-door trips, search stations and places, and find nearby stops with up-to-the-minute results. Benefit from coverage in the UK, Switzerland, Belgium, and Norway.

capabilities.name: ch_search_connections
capabilities.description: Search for train connections in Switzerland between two stations. Uses transport.opendata.ch API to provide real-time connection data including departure times, duration, platforms, and transfers.

capabilities.name: ch_search_stations
capabilities.description: Search for Swiss train stations by name or location.

capabilities.name: ch_get_departures
capabilities.description: Get departure board for a Swiss train station with real-time information.

capabilities.name: ch_nearby_stations
capabilities.description: Find nearby Swiss train stations based on coordinates (latitude, longitude).

capabilities.name: be_search_connections
capabilities.description: Search train connections in Belgium between two stations. Powered by iRail API for real-time routes and schedules.

capabilities.name: be_search_stations
capabilities.description: Search for Belgian train stations by name.

capabilities.name: be_get_departures
capabilities.description: Get live departure board for a Belgian train station.

capabilities.name: be_get_vehicle
capabilities.description: Get details about a specific Belgian train vehicle by its ID.

capabilities.name: no_search_places
capabilities.description: Autocomplete search across stops/addresses/POIs in Norway via Entur Geocoder.

capabilities.name: no_stop_departures
capabilities.description: Upcoming departures for a StopPlace ID (e.g., 'NSR:StopPlace:58368').

capabilities.name: no_trip
capabilities.description: Door-to-door trip planning between two StopPlaces (NSR IDs).

capabilities.name: no_nearest_stops
capabilities.description: Find nearest StopPlaces for a coordinate (lat, lon) within a radius in meters.
